name: 4A BU Med Ctr/NEU/HCC/south end sunny cozy room
neighborhood_overview: Located in Boston's south end, 5 minute walk to BU medical area. Easy access to orange line silver line T and buses on Mass Ave.
description:
located in quiet one way street, cozy room in 4th floor 4room 2baths in brownstone building, one full bed, one closet, newly sanded floor, new paint. Walk to BU medical center, minutes to downtown Boston by bus and subway.

The space
cozy unit with 4rooms, 2 bath, kitchen, living/dining room.

Guest access
shared kitchen and baths, simple utensils, fridge, microwave oven, toaster oven.
cups/forks/plates if not in the cabinets check the dish washer.
Free wi-fi.

Other things to note
Room on 4th floor.
